fun.connor.cafe.domain.score

Interface ScoreCalculator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleScoreCalculator

    public interface ScoreCalculator
    Interface for visit score calculation. Since score calculation need not be persisted, this interface provides methods for calculating the score of a sequence of CafeVisits and a single CafeVisit. Some scoring strategies may score visits differently in sequence than individually.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Score calculateScore(java.util.List<CafeVisit> visits)
      Calculate the score for the given sequence of visits
      Score calculateSingleScore(CafeVisit visit)
      Calculate the score for the given visit in a vacuum
